attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please help local businesses in newbury berkshire.  We have the worst town council who are destroying day by day small businesses in favour of bigger ones.  Please help us get some publicity for newbury and celebrate the fact that we are a market town and not a huge shopping destination.  I am a local restauranteur who is struggling due to improvements which will take 2 years.  many small businesses will not be here then PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
